name: Double-Barreled Doppelgänger
description:
In Double-Barreled Doppelgänger, you play as a ghost, trying to kill all the ghost hunters which have broken into your castle. Use your invisibility, and noisemaker toy shotgun to scare enemies, or lure them towards you, to their death!

Created for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts

(This is my first ever first completed game, I know it is kinda buggy and un-intuitive, so sorry bout that)
